job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkelen van schaalbare en krachtige (AI) applicaties met behulp van het Laravel/Vue-framework
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the development of applications using specific frameworks, which is a core software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Samenwerken met ons team van ongeveer 15 collega's aan end-to-end AI-applicatieontwikkeling
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the collaborative aspect of building complete AI applications, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Incidenteel gebruik van low-code platforms zoals n8n en Flutterflow i.c.m. je fullcode ervaring en skills
job_tasks.justification: This describes the use of tools in the development process, even if low-code, in conjunction with full-code development.

job_tasks.phrase: Vertalen van complexe AI-concepten naar praktische toepassingen voor onze klanten
job_tasks.justification: This task involves understanding abstract AI concepts and making them functional and beneficial for clients, demonstrating business alignment.

job_tasks.phrase: Bijdragen aan het continu verbeteren van onze Software Development As A Service methode
job_tasks.justification: This indicates involvement in improving the development process and methodology, a key aspect of software development practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Ervaring met het ontwerpen en implementeren van RESTful API's
job_tasks.justification: Designing and implementing APIs is a fundamental software development task.
Version control is a standard practice in software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Ervaring met AI-technologieën zoals Machine Learning is een pré
job_tasks.justification: While a pré, this directly relates to experience with AI/ML technologies which are core to modeling.
This phrase implies understanding how technology can transform businesses and drive improvements.
Focusing on improving business results is a clear indicator of business understanding and alignment.

soft_skills.phrase: Analytisch sterk en in staat om complexe problemen op te lossen
Goede beheersing van de Nederlandse en Engelse taal in woord en geschrift

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes full-stack development using Laravel and Vue.js, with AI mentioned as a secondary focus or a "plus." While there's mention of "AI-applicatieontwikkeling" and "cutting-edge AI-technologieën," the core responsibilities and required skills are rooted in traditional software engineering, not specialized GenAI or ML engineering tasks like advanced prompt engineering or fine-tuning.
